narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 15-year-old female was last seen at Alexandria at 2025-09-28T01:06:26.791355+00:00. The child was reported missing by neighbor after failing to arrive at school.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 3 hours of disappearance, movement cues turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk suggest travel northbound along I-81. A dark blue 2012 Toyota Camry was observed departing near Alexandria, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 13 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (15-year-old female, wearing greenish-colored hoodie, denim pants, red Crocs) near Lynchburg.

provenance._fulltext: A 15-year-old female was last seen at Alexandria at 2025-09-28T01:06:26.791355+00:00. The child was reported missing by neighbor after failing to arrive at school. Within 3 hours of disappearance, movement cues turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk suggest travel northbound along I-81. A dark blue 2012 Toyota Camry was observed departing near Alexandria, Virginia. Around 13 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (15-year-old female, wearing greenish-colored hoodie, denim pants, red Crocs) near Lynchburg.
